name: frankfort
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of the US state of Kentucky: The governor signed the bill into law at a formal signing ceremony at the State Capitol Building in Frankfort. Frankfort artist Harold Collins has painted portraits of several governors.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Frankfort.He spent five years working as a nurse in Frankfort.A memorial service will be in the Capitol rotunda in Frankfort in early September.Pitino was the big draw this year at the annual literary event at the Frankfort Convention Center.
